name: First Watch
text:
Fast. Play when the "draw encounter cards" step of the mythos phase would begin.
Instead of resolving that step, look at the top X cards of the encounter deck, where X is the number of investigators. Deal those cards among the investigators as you wish, dealing no more than 1 card to each investigator other than yourself. Then, one at a time, each investigator draws the card(s) dealt to them.

flavor: ...so it was, and so shall it ever be.
name: Scroll of Prophecies
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator draws 3 cards, then discards 1 card from their hand.

flavor: I warned you to stay away from me. Now we're both in this together.
name: Jessica Hyde
text:
You get +1 [combat].
Jessica Hyde enters play with 2 damage on her.
[reaction] AFter your turn ends: Heal 1 damage from Jessica Hyde.
